text: African Rifles may refer to: * The King's African Rifles (KAR), a multi- battalion British colonial regiment raised from the various British possessions in East Africa, created in 1902 *The East African Rifles, a British unit created in 1895 that was later merged into the KAR in 1902 *The East African Mounted Rifles, a volunteer unit of white Africans during the First World War, created in 1914 * The Rhodesian African Rifles or (RAR), the oldest regiment in the Rhodesian Army, created in 1940 *The Royal African Rifles, a 1953 adventure film
title: African Rifles
